description:
## ARIA

If the progress bar is describing the loading progress of a particular region of a page,
you should use `aria-describedby` to point to the progress bar, and set the `aria-busy`
attribute to `true` on that region until it has finished loading.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

value.description:
The value of the progress indicator for the determinate and buffer variants.
Value between 0 and 100.

valueBuffer.description:
The value for the buffer variant.
Value between 0 and 100.

variant.description:
The variant to use.
Use indeterminate or query when there is no progress value.

name: LinearProgress

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root and bar2 element if `color="primary"`; bar2 if `variant="buffer"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root and bar2 elements if `color="secondary"`; bar2 if `variant="buffer"`.
descriptions.determinate: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="determinate"`.
descriptions.indeterminate: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="indeterminate"`.
descriptions.buffer: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="buffer"`.
descriptions.query: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="query"`.
descriptions.dashed: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"`.
descriptions.dashedColorPrimary: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"` and `color="primary"`.
descriptions.dashedColorSecondary: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"` and `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.bar: Styles applied to the layered bar1 and bar2 elements.
descriptions.barColorPrimary: Styles applied to the bar elements if `color="primary"`; bar2 if `variant` not "buffer".
descriptions.barColorSecondary: Styles applied to the bar elements if `color="secondary"`; bar2 if `variant` not "buffer".
descriptions.bar1Indeterminate: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="indeterminate or query"`.
descriptions.bar1Determinate: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="determinate"`.
descriptions.bar1Buffer: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="buffer"`.
descriptions.bar2Indeterminate: Styles applied to the bar2 element if `variant="indeterminate or query"`.
descriptions.bar2Buffer: Styles applied to the bar2 element if `variant="buffer"`.
